thread.section_title: Apex Temple Court Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel near the City
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel near the City - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Martin E
title: Excellent hotel near the City
text: My 1st stay here. Room nicely sized- I think some others are a bit tight- with smooth contemporary fittings, nothing too flash. Both bath and walk in shower. Aircon/heating & Wifi worked well. Very quiet overlooking the tranquil square. Bed comfy, sheets a little itchy (??). My room was quite a long walk from the central lift. Bar & facilities very agreeable, with the option of sitting outside. Good breakfast too. Only issue for me was that it's completely functional but a bit soulless. Location was key for me- just 4 mins from my destination. So I'll gladly use it again when I'm in the same part of town
